address.street_address: Apt 123, Business Bay, Bahria Town, Phase VIII, Islamabad

footer_content: We offer a wide range of services including Architectural Design and Planning, Construction, Real Estate Advisory and Procurement.

services.name: Architecture
services.text: We provide a wide variety of services including feasibility, design and preparation of construction documents, getting them approved from relevant regulatory authorities.

services.name: Construction
services.text: Building of new structures, including site preparation, as well as additions and modifications to existing ones.

services.name: Real Estate
services.text: We offer the best possible assistance in buying and selling land, home and commercial buildings to our clients.

home_content: Home Finesse is a Procure/Design/Build architecture firm working since 1998. We are fully equipped to handle projects from start to finish regardless of their unique requirements.
